description: A vulnerability was determined in YunaiV yudao-cloud up to 2025.09. Affected by this issue is some unknown functionality of the file /crm/contact/transfer of the component HTTP Request Handler. This manipulation of the argument contactId causes improper authorization. It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. The exploit has been publicly disclosed and may be utilized. The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way.
